sentences.en: Angel's eye at last fell upon Tess, the hindmost of the four; she, being full of suppressed laughter at their dilemma, could not help meeting his glance radiantly.
sentences.cn: 安琪尔的眼光终于落在了苔丝的身上。 苔丝站在四人队伍的最后，正为她们进退两难而忍不住要笑的时候，接触到他的目光，不禁变得容光焕发。

sentences.en: Each for himself and the devil take the hindmost.
sentences.cn: [谚]争先恐后,落后者遭殃(资产阶级个人主义的准则).

sentences.en: Every man for himself, and the devil take the hindmost.
sentences.cn: 人人顾自己, 落后者遭殃.

sentences.en: Every man for himself, and the devil takes the hindmost.
sentences.cn: 人不为己, 天诛地灭.

sentences.en: Every one for himself and the devil take the hindmost.
sentences.cn: 人人都只考虑自己，谁落后谁倒霉。

sentences.en: Everyone for himself and let the devil take the hindmost.
sentences.cn: 每人都为自己争得利益,让鬼拿最后一份吧.

sentences.en: In this business you have to be tough , and the devil take the hindmost.
sentences.cn: 做这一行必须心狠, 谁顾别人谁吃亏.
魔鬼抓去最后的人;落后者倒霉.
让逃得最慢的人被魔鬼抓去吧(意为不管别人,只顾自己逃命等).
让逃得最慢的人被魔鬼抓去吧〔意为不管别人,只顾自己逃命等〕.

sentences.en: The enemy soldiers fled and let the devil catch the hindmost.
sentences.cn: 敌兵纷纷逃窜,听任后面的人遭殃.

sentences.en: The soldiers fled before the advancing enemy and let the devil take the hindmost.
sentences.cn: 士兵们在进逼的敌军面前纷纷逃窜,听任后面的人遭殃.

sentences.en: They shall go hindmost with their standards.
sentences.cn: 他们要随著自己的旗号,最后起行.

words.tran_cn: 最后面的，最靠近后方的
